title: Areas covered by staircases/lift wells including lobbies as specified, excluding those covered under DC Regulation No
clause_text: Areas covered by staircases/lift wells including lobbies as specified, excluding those covered under DC Regulation No.31 (1) (iii) with special written permission of the Commissioner subject to payment of premium.
